name: amok
text: A comment left by amok was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ppccd, NeoNaoNeo, scifigrl47, softerworld, tttt2, mrblank91)

name: wulvaine
text: A comment left by wulvaine was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ummerr, fakead, Deusoma, Satyr)

name: girlandagun
text: A comment left by girlandagun was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, lobster_mobster, riotdejaneiro, kenthegod, scifigrl47, Anniqu3, LordPretzel, miaou)

name: theguitarhero
text: Otters reach sexual maturity at a different point than humans.

name: shinkusan
text: According to The Internet, river otters reach sexual maturity at around 1.2 years of age. Also according to The Internet, male otters are called "dogs". When people call Philippe Dogg they are being etymologically correct, I guess.

name: u235
text: So is Ray, at this point in the strip.

name: caseyb3
text: Philippe has been five since the Coolidge Administration.

name: shutup_shutup
text: This is possibly the most common comment on this board, or at least in a tight race with "...boned?"

name: fuzzyshoo
text: I believe you have forgotten THESE KNIVES!

name: nilehus
text: NO.

name: dirtyantaeus
text: For some reason, I don't see Ray having a problem with giving Ketel One to a five year old.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
to a five year old stuffed otter

i don't think there are laws against that

name: shutup_shutup
text: So it's the dog playing baseball argument?

name: saint
text: I don't think they could cover that much ground when it comes to regulations. Takes hell of time to get anything done in government.

name: hamscout
text:
there are circumstances in which this should happen.

this is one.

name: donjolly
text: Ray, at this point, was also a whole hell of a lot creepier.

name: fmercury
text: I think he just can't imagine someone not being crazy for the Ketel.

name: wolfslice
text: I really dislike Achewood in color. In my mind Ray is a white cat.

name: overmedicated
text: Same here. Beige just isn't Ray. It isn't... jazzy.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: In my mind, Ray is an orange cat, and Beef and Pat were always grey cats, Beef being a darker shade than Pat.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: All cats are grey.

name: zapatos
text: In the night.

name: tekende
text: In the chair

name: zapatos
text:
[w]thats an otter[/whipser]

Also the "all cats are grey in the night" is something an old inventor and founding father once said. Cuz those old chicas know how to bone.

name: sardoniclaconic
text: It is also a saying in both German and French.

name: zapatos
text: I have much French in my ancestory, we know how to make the sexy times.

name: zapatos
text: ...with older ladies?

name: zapatos
text: ...with my ancestors?

name: godfatherofsouls
text: With anyone, as long as it's dark enough out.

name: featurelessvoid
text:
In the caves.

Yes, I know it is silly to like the Cure.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: He sits tight.

name: kledermans
text: I always see him as kind of a dark tan color, and Roast Beef and Pat as a slightly lighter tan.  They all look strange to me colored grey.

name: mighty_pit
text: A comment left by mighty_pit was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by envika, Wolfslice, I_Love_Kate)

name: orvel
text: I only see cats.

name: girlandagun
text: I think Roast Beef would pimp-slap you for saying that.

name: caseyb3
text: Well he's whiter than Roast Beef, and that's all I ask of Dr. Onstad.

name: sje46
text: Purple.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Everybody likes Ketel One.

name: jhunt
text: Ray knows what you need, even if you don't.

name: dybrar
text: It's because he pays attention.

name: stephicologist
text:
He wasn't simple he was just in shock.
This one is on my wall.

name: f1shst1ck
text: 5'd for color and ketel

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
i wonder what convinced chris to try color.

conversely, i wonder what caused him to switch back to black and white.

(need i bother saying that i prefer the stark simpleness of the black and white? less is more!)

name: cdl146
text: On the whole I prefer the black and white, but the color does a lot to show the passage of time in the first three panels.

name: philosophe
text: I think it was the other way around. Chris: "what's something I can do in color but not in b&w?... I know! Show the passage of time through an incrementally darkening background!"

name: greenkoolayd
text: hell yeah.  good point.

name: mrblank91
text: pretty colours... that's right colours ...

name: overmedicated
text: Hooray England.

name: jlynes
text: It could be Australia!  Why shouldn't it?

name: zem
text: COLOURS, YEAH< DEAL WITH IT

name: dasilodavi
text: You know those times when you're reading a black-and-white strip, and it goes into color, and you get really excited?  Somehow it went in reverse for me on ths one.

name: deusoma
text: A colour strip went into black-and-white, and you got upset?

name: dasilodavi
text: No no, I guess I mean to say "opposite," as in this strip was in color and I was less happy with it than I would have been if it was in black in white.

name: deusoma
text: 's okay. I was just being silly.

name: peterjoel
text: "We had to use a spatula" as a punchline is almost on par with "here are some of their hands".

name: bourbonsamurai
text: What did the spatula do? Was he lowered into the little coffin on it?

name: tellumo
text: He wasn't "lowered" so much as "scraped." :-(

name: vice
text: Does Phillipe take an olive or a twist?

name: aparrish
text: Heh, heh! How'd you know he was out of olives? You crack me up, vice.

name: imbattin
text: Philippe's days are busy.

name: hairymoonstone
text: a spatula! ha.

name: henrythecad
text: Ray is terrible with children.

name: yomimono
text: The color of Philippe's pants upsets me.  It seems wrong to wear condiment-colored clothing to a french fry's funeral.

name: phthano
text: Why did Ray change color?

name: jollysaintpete
text: he went inside where there was a light on

name: mikeronomicon
text: I'm giving this a five just for Ray's contibuting to the delinquency of minors. Hell yeah I want some kettle one!

name: tom-ba
text: I don't think Philippe will know about olive or twist...

name: tom-ba
text: Ah well, the server is acting oddly tonight, and didn't show any comments for this strip until after I posted...

name: sje46
text: Hello green skies.

name: tbtabby
text: Doesn't that mean a tornado?

name: red-barchetta
text: The last panel, framed. I must have it.
